item.title: Intro to Note-Taking with LaTeX
item.author: Hashem A. Damrah
item.description: This tutorial series will help you set up Neovim for taking beautiful, effective, and easy notes that are easy to manage. Here is an example of what I have in mind: The goal of this series is to make writing LaTeX as easy (fast, efficient, enjoyable …) as writing math by hand and more enjoyable. This series should help you if: You’re interested in taking real-time lecture notes using LaTeX. You’re hoping to switch from a LaTeX editor you’re using to NeoVim, but are unsure on how to do so.
